name: Metatile (16px + ScreenScroll) Plugin
author: Mico27
description:
Integrates the concept of metatiles in gbstudio (16px version with screen scroll support).
WARNING: this plugin modifies the following engine files:
- actor.h
- camera.h
- collision.h
- scroll.h
- actor.c
- camera.c
- collision.c
- data_manager.c
- interrupts.c
- scroll.c
- adventure.c
Any other plugin that modifies any of these files will not be compatible with this plugin unless the files are manually merged.
